title: here is the response from riot after asking why i wasnt perma banned.
body:
i get banned for a botted account after i asked them why  i wasnt banned for toxicity.

kLfBtMarshall
November 19th 2017, 12:00:39 am

i tried to be as toxic as i could why wasnt i given a perma ban?
i see people complain about saying a particular word and getting banned, i tried to say every word.

The Mad Clown
November 19th 2017, 7:38:21 pm

Hello kLfBtMarshall,

The Mad Clown from Player Support here.

Your account has been linked to suspicious activity surrounding account selling and the use of third-party programs, sometimes known as bots. Suspensions applied to accounts for this reason cannot be lifted. If you believe this ban is in error, feel free to let me know and I'll be happy to look into the matter for you. Please know, however, that it's unlikely that the decision will be reversed.

Best of luck in your future endeavors.

Kind regards,
The Mad Clown
Player Support Specialist
Riot Games
"Why so serious?"
